js.aliasref: The alias will reference the account number entered and can be used to send Nhz to, messages, etc..

js.assetignoresuc: Asset added to ignore list succesfully
js.blockuptodate: The block chain is now up to date.

js.welcomenewacc: Welcome to your brand new account. You should found it with some coins. Your Account ID is: <strong>
js.rsdifferent: Generated Reed Solomon adress different from the one in the blockchain!
js.nopublickey: Warning!: Your account does not have a public key! This means it's not as protected as other accounts. You must make an outgoing transaction to fix this issue. (send a message, buy an alias, send Nhz, ...)
js.leasedoutstart: Your effective balance is leased out starting from block
js.leaseeffect: Remember: This lease will take effect after the current lease has ended.
js.willbeleased: Your account effective balance will be leased out starting from block

js.oncesubmitted: Remember: Once submitted the lease cannot be cancelled.
js.multiple: Multiple different assets have been sold and/or bought.
js.invalidinputid: Invalid input. Search by ID or reed solomon account number.

js.phraseminlength: Secret phrase must be at least 35 characters long.

js.mustenterphrase: You must enteer your secret phrase. If you don't have one, click the registration button below.
js.nors: Could not generate Reed Solomon address.
js.alreadytaken: This account is already taken. Please choose another pass phrase.
js.rememberlogout: Remember to log out at the end of your session so as to clear the password from memory.
js.notsecurelength: Your secret phrase is less than 35 characters long. This is not secure.
js.notsecureletter: Your secret phrase does not contain numbers and uppercase letters. This is not secure.
js.outdated: A new NRS release is available. It is recommended that you update.
js.errnoenc: Could not find public key for recipient, which is necessary for sending encrypted messages.
